name: screen-control
description: 桌面自动化：截图+OCR识别屏幕内容、移动/点击鼠标、输入文字、滚动。仅支持 macOS。

tools.name: screen_capture
tools.description: Take a screenshot and OCR-recognize all text on screen. Returns the screenshot file path, screen dimensions, mouse position, and all recognized text content. Use this to 'see' the current screen.

tools.name: screen_info
tools.description: Get current screen dimensions and mouse cursor position without taking a screenshot.

tools.name: mouse_move
tools.description: Move the mouse cursor to the specified screen coordinates.

tools.name: mouse_click
tools.description: Click at the specified screen coordinates. Supports left click, right click, and double click.

tools.name: mouse_drag
tools.description: Drag from one position to another (left mouse button held down).

tools.name: keyboard_type
tools.description: Type text at the current cursor position. Supports Unicode including Chinese characters.

tools.name: scroll
tools.description: Scroll at the specified screen position.
